article:
'[[Turkey]]' is divided into 81 provinces (). Each province is divided into a
number of different districts (). The provincial governorate is set in the
central district (). The central district usually bears the name of the province
(e.g, the city of Van is the central district of Van Province). There are only 3
exceptions It was 4. The city of Mersin was previously under

A province is administered by an appointed governor () from the ministry
of interior.
